name: j019873h
description:
An FPS Arcade Arena Shooter that encourages constant movement and shooting enemy weak points for a high score. The game also features a skill tree so players can experiment with defensive or offensive play styles.

Best played with a keyboard and mouse, however a controller can be used during gameplay.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

LMB to shoot

RMB to alt fire

Space to jump

Scroll Wheel to cycle weapons

1/2/3/4 and Directional Keys to change to specific weapon

Esc for pause menu

Tab for skill tree

This was my final year project for Game Design and Programming Bsc Hons at Staffordshire University.
